panels.description: Tests v33 migration behavior when panel datasource is explicitly null. Should remain null after migration (returnDefaultAsNull: true).

targets.description: Target with UID reference should migrate to full object

panels.title: Panel Datasource: null → should stay null

panels.description: Tests v33 migration behavior when panel datasource is already a proper object reference. Should remain unchanged.

targets.description: Target with existing object should remain unchanged

panels.title: Panel Datasource: existing object → should stay unchanged

panels.description: Tests v33 migration when panel datasource is a string name. Should convert to proper object with uid, type, apiVersion.
panels.title: Panel Datasource: string name → should migrate to object

panels.description: Tests v33 migration when panel has datasource string but empty targets array. Panel datasource should still migrate.
panels.title: Panel Datasource: string name with empty targets → should migrate

panels.description: Tests v33 target migration with various edge cases: null target (unchanged), valid string (migrated), non-existing string (preserved), missing datasource field (unchanged).

targets.description: Null target datasource should remain null
Valid string should migrate to object
Non-existing datasource should be preserved as-is (migration returns nil)
Target without datasource field should remain unchanged

panels.title: Target Datasources: mixed null/string/non-existing scenarios

panels.description: Tests v33 migration when panel datasource is null but targets have mixed reference types (object, string). Panel should stay null, targets should migrate appropriately.

targets.description: Existing object target should remain unchanged
String target should migrate to object
Default datasource string should migrate to object

panels.title: Panel: null datasource with mixed target types

panels.description: Tests v33 migration behavior with empty string datasource. Should migrate to empty object {} based on MigrateDatasourceNameToRef logic.

targets.description: Empty string target should also migrate to empty object {}

panels.title: Empty string datasource → should return empty object {}

panels.description: Tests v33 migration with completely unknown datasource names. Since migration returns nil for unknown datasources, they should be preserved unchanged.

targets.description: Unknown target datasource should remain unchanged (migration returns nil)
Empty string target should migrate to {}

panels.title: Non-existing datasources → should be preserved as-is

panels.description: Nested panel with string datasource should migrate to proper object reference, proving row panel recursion works.

targets.description: Nested target should also migrate from string to object

panels.title: Nested Panel: string datasource → should migrate to object
Row Panel: nested panels should also migrate

spec.title: V33 Panel Datasource Name to Ref Test
